Text: Any suggestions on what to add to this and/or what to remove? I've been thinking of putting in some files on mechanics in general and alternative energy source tutorials.

very impressive list. 


now if only people would seed. lol
got anything on growing food or making medicine?

Archery, spear fighting, food growing, large scale electrical production, and mechanical engineering would be a great addition. You could remove much of the hi-tech computer stuff as this, as you state yourself, will not be needed after the emp.
Will seed military and NEETS at least to 3:1
I'm putting together a new release or addendum that will detail more survivalist, medical, and historical military information. Give it some time...

"I suggest printing what you think you may need. An EMP will make digital media fairly useless."

Lmao! A little paranoid are we?

Chance favors the prepared mind.. Who will be laughing last if he is right. 

Cool upload man.
I always thought the high-tech stuff was/would be handy in the event of an apocalypse. How else will you rebuild? Communication is key and he who can communicate holds some power.
